dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Trademark and Copyright Infringement]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

The URLs in question are currently not accessible as of 1:21:07 p.m.
(GMT-6) on June 23, 2006.

Legal Response Team
The Planet

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Tuesday, June 20, 2006 6:51 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Trademark and Copyright Infringement]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Trademark and Copyright Infringement]


For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Trademark and Copyright Infringement
Date:         Tue, 20 Jun 2006 20:43:05 +1000
From:         Potiris, Georgia <gpotiris@nutrimetics.com.au>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>, <admins@theplanet.com>



Dear Sir / Madam

I act as Legal Counsel on behalf of Nutrimetics Australia Pty Ltd, the
exclusive licensee of the Nutrimetics trademarks and exclusive owner of
copyright material associated with the sale and distribution of the
products bearing the Nutrimetics trademarks.

It has been brought to our attention that The Planet.com Internet
Services is hosting the websites* **_www.discountnutrimetics.com_***
<http://www.discountnutrimetics.com>******* and
**_www.nutrimeticsonline.com_* <http://www.nutrimeticsonline.com>**

Nutrimetics has acquired over many years a world-wide reputation as a
manufacturer and distributor of high-quality cosmetics bearing the
Nutrimetics trademark.  The Nutrimetics trade mark is also the subject
of trade mark registrations in relation to among other things,
cosmetics, soaps, toiletries and associated services involving the
marketing and distribution of these products in various jurisdictions.


Nutrimetics have also acquired extensive common law rights in relation
to these trade marks as a result of many years' use.  Only Nutrimetics
and its authorised distributors and licensees may use the Nutrimetics
trade marks and in fact distribute products bearing the Nutrimetics
trademark.

I am instructed that these web sites are or have been displaying,
offering for sale and/or selling products bearing the Nutrimetics trade
marks on websites depicting the Nutrimetics trademark and displaying
copyright protected images from Nutrimetics brochures and catalogues
without the licence or authority of the intellectual property owner.
This conduct constitutes an infringement of Nutrimetics' intellectual
property rights.  It causes us considerable concern and entitles
Nutrimetics to commence proceedings against the web site owners for
injunctions (including interlocutory injunctions) orders for delivery up
and compensation.

Nutrimetics therefore has sent a demand to the web site administrator to
:

         1. immediately and voluntarily remove the unauthorized
            copyright protected images from these websites; and
         2. immediately and voluntarily remove the unauthorized domain
            names from the internet.

We would be most grateful if you could also advise us as to what further
information you require from us in order to implement the removal of
this site from the internet in light of the infringement of our rights
in this regard.

I may be reached on +61 438 174 373 or by reply email and would
appreciate your urgent response and assistance.

Kind regards

Georgia Potiris
Legal Counsel & Company Secretary
Nutrimetics Australia Pty Ltd
5 Burwood Highway
Wantirna Vic  3152
Ph: + 61 3 9298 7019
Fax: + 61 3 9801 1072
Mobile: 0438 174 373
